summary: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.
cast: Paul Mercurio|Tara Morice|Bill Hunter|Pat Thomson|Gia Carides|Peter Whitford|Barry Otto|John Hannan|Sonia Kruger|Kris McQuade|Pip Mushin|Leonie Page|Antonio Vargas|Armonia Benedito|Jack Webster|Lauren Hewett|Steve Grace|Paul Bertram|Di Emery|Lara Mulcahy|Brian M. Logan|Michael Burgess|Todd McKenney|Kerry Shrimpton|Simone Gage|Bradley Sabott|Ray Mather|Jo Shinta|Peter Lynch|Lee Becchiet|Warren Ring|Jaya Jamieson|John O'Connell|Anita Curtis|Roxana Vella|Deanne Curtis|Ángel García|Dene Kermond|Genevieve White|Lisa Ellis|Jacqueline Lendich|Bob Adams|Michelle McClatchy
title: El amor está en el aire
